metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4522 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from 16.2.0. Committing directories containing LF character results in 500 errors when viewing the commit

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
